snippet.title: Missing Syrian dissident reappears
snippet.description:
Middle East / 27 May 2002
… in a hospital in Brussels. Mr Nayyouf is quoted as saying he had been abducted from his hotel in Bruges, where he had been due to address an international…

snippet.title: All quiet on Ostend front
snippet.description:
France / 10 June 2000
… a difficult group. The French had promised two players would be available at their plush hotel 15 minutes from Bruges. But the number of interviewees…
